title: Subdomain Routing Validity
description: Verify that each store is uniquely identified and accessible via its functional subdomain and that invalid subdomains return a 404 error.

steps.description: Navigate to a known valid store subdomain URL
Check that the store catalog and brand information load correctly
Navigate to an invalid/nonexistent subdomain URL
Verify the system returns a 404 page with appropriate message

title: Store Data Isolation via RLS
description: Confirm store data is properly isolated and secured using row-level security policies so that stores cannot access others' data.

steps.description: Log in as store owner A and attempt to query or access store B's data via backend endpoints or UI
Verify access is denied and no data from store B is visible
Repeat the test with store B accessing store A data
Confirm similar data isolation behavior

title: Customer Browsing and Catalog Viewing
description: Ensure customers can browse the menu catalog with categories and view product details accurately.

steps.description: Access the store via valid subdomain
Browse product categories from the catalog page
Verify correct display of categories and corresponding products
Click on a product to access the product detail page
Check that detailed product info, images, prices, and extras are shown correctly

title: Shopping Cart Persistence and Product Extras
description: Verify that adding products with customizable extras to the cart persists correctly in localStorage and maintains uniqueness per store session.

steps.description: Add a product with selected extras to the shopping cart
Check that the cart reflects proper product and extras combination
Reload or revisit the store page within the same session
Verify the cart contents persist accurately from localStorage
Add the same product with different extras to the cart
Ensure the cart distinguishes product-extras combos as unique entries

title: Checkout Flow with Multi-Step Validation and Coupon Application
description: Test the full checkout flow including customer info input, order mode selection (delivery or pickup), multi-step validation, coupon code application, and order creation.

steps.description: Proceed to checkout with items in cart
Fill in valid customer contact and delivery/pickup information
Check for realtime validation feedback on all customer inputs
Apply a valid coupon code
Verify coupon discount reflects correctly in order summary
Attempt to apply an invalid or expired coupon code
Confirm an appropriate error message is shown and discount is not applied
Complete the checkout by submitting the order
Ensure order is successfully created and confirmation is shown

title: Real-time Order Notifications and Status Updates
description: Verify that store owners receive real-time order notifications with audio alerts and that order status updates propagate correctly using Supabase Realtime.

steps.description: Place an order as a customer
Check that a real-time notification is delivered to the store owner's admin interface with audio alert
Update the order status (e.g., from pending to preparing)
Verify that order status updates in real-time on customer and admin UI

title: Delivery Zones Configuration and Driver GPS Tracking
description: Confirm that delivery zones are configured correctly with accurate pricing and that driver GPS tracking updates delivery statuses in real-time.

steps.description: Configure multiple delivery zones with distinct pricing
Verify that delivery prices during checkout reflect the configured zones correctly
Assign a driver to a delivery order
Confirm that driver GPS location updates are visible in real-time in the admin dashboard
Have the driver update delivery status and upload photo and signature proof via the PWA
Verify all delivery proofs meet file size/format requirements and reflect correctly in order records

title: WhatsApp Notification Integration
description: Validate that WhatsApp message templates generate correct notifications with dynamic variables and send order and promotional messages successfully.

steps.description: Place an order triggering WhatsApp notification
Check that the order confirmation message is generated with correct dynamic details and delivered via WhatsApp
Create and send a promotional WhatsApp campaign using templates
Verify all dynamic template variables populate correctly and messages send to target recipients

title: Subscription and Feature Gating Enforcement
description: Test subscription plans enforce feature limitations, monitor usage, and prompt upgrades when thresholds are reached.

steps.description: Select and activate a subscription plan with defined feature limits
Use features up to the plan limit (e.g., maximum number of coupons or AI credits)
Confirm that usage is tracked and displayed accurately
Attempt to use features beyond subscription limits
Verify the system prompts an upgrade or restricts functionality

title: User Authentication with Email Verification and Password Reset
description: Ensure the authentication system supports secure sign-up with email verification and password reset workflows.

steps.description: Register a new user account with valid email and password
Receive and verify email verification link and activate account successfully
Attempt login prior to email verification
Check login is denied with appropriate message
Use password reset function with registered email
Receive reset email and successfully update password using the reset link

title: Analytics Event Tracking and Reporting
description: Verify that key events such as funnel steps, abandoned cart, sales and catalog views are tracked by PostHog and reflected in analytics dashboards.

steps.description: Perform multiple order-related actions like browsing, adding to cart, checkout initiation, and order completion
Confirm corresponding analytics events are recorded in PostHog with accurate data
Access the admin analytics dashboard
Ensure charts and reports display up-to-date and correct metrics reflecting the tracked events

title: Driver PWA Authentication and Delivery Workflow
description: Validate that drivers can authenticate, toggle availability, receive and update delivery assignments, and complete deliveries with proof capture.

steps.description: Login to Driver PWA with valid credentials
Check successful authentication and dashboard access
Toggle driver delivery availability status
Verify status updates reflect correctly in system
Receive a delivery assignment
Confirm assignment details are shown in real-time
Update the delivery status through assigned stages (pickup, en route, delivered)
Capture photo and signature proof upon delivery completion
Verify proof images upload rules and associate correctly to the delivery record

title: Payment Methods and Payment Proof Upload
description: Test multiple payment options are offered including bank transfer with payment proof upload, and ensure validations on uploaded files.

steps.description: Select each available payment method during checkout
Verify payment method options and UI behave as expected
For bank transfer payment, upload payment proof files
Confirm uploaded proof files meet size and format requirements otherwise show error
Submit payment information
Validate payment data is stored and reflected in order status

title: Localization Support for Spanish Language and Dual Currency
description: Verify UI and price displays switch correctly for Spanish translations and dual currency with automatic and manual exchange rate updates.

steps.description: Select Spanish language option in settings
Check that all UI text appears correctly in Spanish
Enable dual currency display and observe prices
Verify prices show both original currency and Venezuelan Bolívar (VES) with correct conversion
Trigger automatic exchange rate update
Confirm exchange rate is updated and prices recalculated
Manually override exchange rate in admin settings
Verify manual rate applies and reflects in pricing

title: Live Chat Support Integration via Chatwoot
description: Test that live chat embedded in the admin interface connects successfully, allows message sending and receiving.

steps.description: Navigate to admin dashboard with Chatwoot embedded
Ensure live chat widget loads correctly
Send a message through live chat
Verify message is received and echoed back by support or test accounts

title: AI-powered Photo Enhancement with Credit Deduction
description: Ensure the AI photo enhancement feature enhances product photos while deducting credits from user subscription and prevents usage if credits are insufficient.

steps.description: Upload a product photo and invoke AI enhancement
Check that photo is enhanced and displayed with improved quality
Verify user AI credit count is decremented by correct amount
Attempt AI enhancement with zero or insufficient credits
Confirm the system blocks enhancement and prompts to purchase more credits or upgrade subscription

title: Admin Dashboard Access Control
description: Verify that only authenticated store owners can access admin features and panels, and unauthorized access is blocked.

steps.description: Attempt to access admin dashboard URL without login
Check redirection to login page or access denied message
Login as a store customer or non-owner user
Attempt to access admin dashboard
Verify access is forbidden or UI elements are hidden
Login as authenticated store owner
Confirm full access to admin features and controls

title: Platform Uptime and Performance Testing
description: Check platform uptime is maintained at 99.5% and page load times are under 2 seconds on 3G networks across key pages.

steps.description: Perform automated uptime monitoring over an extended period
Ensure uptime percentage is ≥ 99.5%
Simulate 3G network conditions on common user pages (catalog, checkout, order confirmation)
Verify page load times remain under 2 seconds

title: Security Standards Compliance for Data Encryption and Privacy
description: Validate that all authentication data, personal information, and payment data are secured with encryption and privacy policies are enforced.

steps.description: Perform penetration testing on authentication and payment flows
Confirm use of HTTPS/TLS encryption and secure storage of sensitive data
Review privacy policy enforcement in data handling and user consent screens
Verify policies are presented clearly and followed during data collection
